the quality, condition or fact of being enslaved or addicted to a habit obsessively, esp. to a bad one as consuption of narcotic drugs.
a woman who is anxious to meet her lover.
with a whizzing sound.
the whizzing sound.
= ಬಸವಳಿ.
to lose control on one's body or mind.
to take or bring under control; to keep under check.
a variety of banana tree.
its fruit.
the large, deciduous tree Ficus virens ( = F. infectoria) of Moraceae family, with arerial roots, membranous leaves and sessile fruits; five-leaved fig tree.
a place or region having ficus (fig) tree.
= ಬಸರಿ.
the creeper Basella alba ( = B. cordifolia) of Basellaceae family, leaves of which are used as a vegetable.
another creeper Basella rubra of the same family.
an uncastrated ox; a bull.
Nandi, the bull-vehicle of Śiva.
a bull left in the name of a god to wander and graze at its will.
Basava, a reformer of twelfth century.
(fig.) an idle man who roams about without taking any responsibility.

ಬಸವನ ಕಣ್ಣು basavana kaṇṇu a kind of eye disease; ಬಸವನ ಕೊಂಬಿನ ಹುಳು basavana kombina huḷu = ಬಸವನ ಹುಳು; ಬಸವನ ಕೋಡಿನ ಹುಳು basavana kōḍina huḷu = ಬಸವನ ಹುಳು; ಬಸವನ ಬಿಡು basavana biḍu to allowin the name of a god a bull to wander at its will; ಬಸವನ ಹುಳು basavana huḷu any mollusk of the class Gastropoda, having a spirally coiled shell and a ventral muscular foot on which it slowly glides about; 2. (fig.) anything that moves, progresses in a very slow pace.
= ಬಸಂತ.
to play mutually sprinkling the red coloured water, as on some festive occasions.
a whore; a harlot.
to become subject to or be under another's control.
= ಬಸವಡು.
= ಬಸವ.
= ಬಸವ.
the large, deciduous tree Lagerstroemia lanceolata of Lythraceae family, with thin, white bark and hard wood which is used building construction.
the large, deciduous tree Toona ciliata ( = Cedrela toona) of Meliaceae family, with paripinnate leaves and white flowers, the wood of which is used in making plywood, tea-chests, furniture, etc.
any of the leaves, grass used in worshipping Śiva or Gaṇēśa.
the medium sized, ever-green tree Bauhinia malabarica of Caesalinaceae family.
the small flower plant Impatiens balsamina of Balsaminaceae family.
a kind of plant.
to lose one's strength; to become weak or be defeated.
to become unconscious; to lose consciousness.
to fall down suddenly losing one's physical strength; to collapse.
to undergo difficulty, destress, etc.
to die; to cease to live.
to make another faint from fatigue or by losing strength.
= ಬಸವಳಿ.
a girl symbolically married to the god of a temple, and who has to spend her life in the service of the temple and also as a prostitute.
a cow left in the name of a god, to wander and graze at its will.
(the condition of being absorbed) to become intensified.
= ಬಸಲೆ.
to ooze out in drops; to trickle.
to strain out excess water from the rice that is boiled.
(a liquid) to fall down continuously, in a stream.
(sweat) to emit and fall.
to pour (a liquid) down.
to wipe (a liquid from a surface).
(fig.) to grow less gradually.
to erase or eradicate completely.

ಬಸಿದುಕೊಳ್ಳು basidu koḷḷu to strain the liquid from a container without disturbing the sediments at the bottom; 2. (contemp. or sarc.) to drink (coffee, milk or other liquid); ಬಸಿದು ಬೀಳು basidu bīḷu to callapse due to loss of blood from the body; 2. to flow out profusely (as a stream); ಬಸಿದ ಸಾರು basida sāru a thin soup made by straining the liquid in which a dhal is cooked with or without a vegetable.
to sharpen (a knife, tool, etc.) by grinding or friction; to whet.
to have a sharp blade or to become sharp, keen.
a piece of hard material with two principal faces meeting in a sharply acute angle; a wedge.
a sharp-pointed aborted branch; a spine; a prickle; a thorn.
a small, round, shallow dish to hold a cup or to hold the liquid that may spill from the cup; a saucer.
a semitransparent or translucent, opalescent, pearly-blue variety of adularia, used as a gem; moonstone.
any of several adularescent feldspars, as certain varieties of albite, labradorite or oligoclase, used as gems; moonstone.
a kind of thin alcoholic liquor.
a sitting on one's knees.
a sitting posture in which the weight falls on the feet, legs are bent at the knees, while the buttocks are touching the backside of the ankles.

a kind of exercise in which, one a standing with both feet placed close to each other, bending the knees lowers the upper portion of the body and gets up, without taking any support, and repeating the process for several times.
a mode of riding a horse, in which the rider leaving his weight on the stirrup, and keeps getting up from and sits again on the back of the horse repeatedly.
the area covered, occupied, pervaded.
firmness; resoluteness.
the act or process of straining, pouring a liquid.
the quality of being sharp, keep (as the blade of a cutting weapon); sharpness.
the quality of being biting or pungent in one's speech, behaviour, etc.
a boy or man with a running nose.
a very cruel, brutal man.
(a woman) to have a child or other offspring developing in the body; to become pregnant.
a woman having an unborn child within her body; a pregnant woman.
= ಬಸರಿ.
(the faetus in the uterus) to be brought forth before becoming viable; to be miscarried; to be aborted; (pregnancy) to be aborted.
the part of the body of a mammal between the thorax and the pelvis; the belly; the abdomen.
the enlarged, muscular, expandable portion of the oviduct in which the fertilised ovum implants and develops or rests during prenatal development; the womb of certain mammals; the uterus.
the state of being pregnant (said of women).
the mind; the inner faculty.
the line of descendants of a particular ancestor; family; lineage.
the young of an animal including that of humans developing in the womb; a faetus.

ಬಸಿರು ಮಾಡು basiru māḍu to make pregnant; to impregnate; ಬಸಿರಿರು basiriru = ಬಸಿರಾಗು; ಬಸಿರು ನಿಲ್ಲು basiru nillu (pregnancy) to take place; ಬಸಿರಾಗು basirāgu to have a young one being developed within (said of a woman); to become pregnant; ಬಸಿರ ಕಿಚ್ಚು basira kiccu a feeling of discontent and ill will because of another's advantages, possessions, etc.; resentful dislike of another who has something that one desires; envy; enviousness; ಬಸಿರ ಕುತ್ತ basira kutta = ಬಸಿರ್ಕುತ್ತ; ಬಸಿರುರಿ basiruri = ಬಸಿರ ಕಿಚ್ಚು; ಬಸಿರೊಡೆ basiroḍe = ಬಸಿರಿಳಿ.
a severe, wrenching pain in the abdomen or abdomen region.
an intestinal disorder characterised by abnormal frequency and fluidity of faceal evacuations; diarrhoea.
a boy or man from whose mouth saliva keeps flowing out.
= ಬಸಿರು.
= ಬಸಿರಾನು.
